posts.title: Joywave
posts.body:
Dive into a world of electrifying sound and limitless creativity when the American trio Joywave takes over the Pumpehuset in Copenhagen
Joywave consists of vocalist/multi-instrumentalist Daniel Armbruster, guitarist Joseph Morinelli and drummer Paul Brenner. They are now ready with their fifth studio album, "Permanent Pleasure", which will be released on Friday 17 May. Here they delve deeper into guitar and string sections without sacrificing the signature sound that has endeared the band to countless fans over the past years, and which has established them as a band you can just as easily hear in a hip record store as in the grocery store.
Oplev dem live i Pumpehuset d. 12. november 2024.

posts.title: Two Another
posts.body:
The electropop sensation Two Another is back in town
The temperature will be high and the pop party total when Two Another fills Pumpehuset with their smooth and groovy electropop, which includes draws inspiration from 60s soul, alternative R&B, 80s funk and modern electronic pop.
The Danish music lovers who went in vain the last time Two Another played in a sold-out Ideal Bar can now rejoice that the English-American duo will soon follow up on the success. On 19 November, they give their biggest Danish concert to date, when they fire up the Pump House.
The story of Two Another's origin begins under the Australian sun. British-born Angus Campbell and American Eliot Porter met through a music program run by the electronic duo Bag Raiders at their school in Sydney. They quickly found the melody in their shared love of indie pop, French electro, dance and hip-hop. After finishing school, they traveled separately in Australia and Europe before meeting in London in 2015 to form Two Another.
After millions of streams and a successful release with the EP "Another Tape" (2018), Two Another's debut album "Back to Us" landed in 2022. Here, the duo proclaims their love for R&B-sounding melodies, groovy funk bass and alternative pop.
Their latest release is the EP "FRESHMAN", which was released in April 2024 and is filled with excellent mellow laid back sunshine pop, which will act as the perfect soundtrack for the autumn concert visit.

Today, Gatecreeper is an iconic name in the world of death metal, touring globally under their own banner. Get a taste of their powerful and raw death metal when they take the stage at Pumpehuset on November 24, 2024.

posts.title: Trentemøller
posts.body:
Trentemøller will occupy the Pumpehuset three nights in a row this autumn
Three magical evenings await with one of Denmark's and the world's great masters of electronic atmosphere when Trentemøller swings his tour past Pumpehuset on 31 October, 1 and 2 November 2024.
Trentemøller has enchanted his live audiences with his unique soundscapes and memorable melodies over the past two decades. With more than 500 shows worldwide, he has established himself as a true master of his craft. His music represents a continuously evolving range of themes and ideas, and his shows consistently push the boundaries of what we expect from live music.
Whether you're a long-time fan or he's a new acquaintance, you can't miss Trentemøller's live performances with a full band. The band consists of Disa Jakobs on vocals, guitar and synthesizers, Silas Tinglef on drums and guitar, Brian Batz on guitar, Jacob Haubjerg on bass and Anders Trentemøller on synthesizers.
Trentemøllers debut-fuldlængde album, "The Last Resort", blev udgivet i 2006 efter en række EP'er og introducerede Trentemøllers musik til et bredere publikum. Den seneste udgivelse, "Memoria", hans sjette studiealbum, indeholder dyster, introspektive stykker, motorik, drømmepop, støjrock og elektronisk pop. Han fortsætter med at arbejde med velkendte temaer om lys og mørke, turbulens og ro, skærende kulde og trøstende varme, tydeligt inspireret af de modsatte elementer i den nordiske omgivelse, han kalder hjem. Han går meget længere ind i dette velkendte territorium, samtidig med at han undersøger nye temaer.
In recent years, Trentemøller has also remixed music by artists such as Tricky, Savages, Depeche Mode, Franz Ferdinand, The Knife, A Place To Bury Strangers, Soft Moon, UNKLE, adding to a list of over a hundred previously released remixes.

posts.title: You Me At Six

They have built up a dedicated following of fans with the help of their energetic live performances and moving lyrics.

posts.title: APHACA
posts.body:
Their impact is like a brilliant yellow dandelion growing up through the asphalt. The band APHACA is ready to take over the Pump House as part of their autumn tour
APHACA has been simmering in the Danish underground with releases such as the triple-single, 'Flora Flora', the 2022 album, 'ET AAR UDEN DIG' and most recently APHACA released their first EP 'Mig Og Min Mund' which has already been met with enormous praise.
Rumle, Bertram, Bertil and Noah met at Det Frie Gymnasium in Nørrebro in Copenhagen. The democratic and creative DNA of the alternative school propagated itself and took root in the four friends, who above all had music in common – music that wanted and needed to be released.
Like a dandelion through asphalt, inspired by the Latin name of the yellow plant and the Det Fris logo, APHACA came into existence. Their sound is immediate, nostalgic and timeless, but right here and now, grounded in a natural curiosity for the individual instrument. The lyrics are as direct as they are figurative, and pull on the nerves of youth, whether you are a flower or a dandelion child.
Lead singer Rumle from APHACA gives an insight into what we can expect from APHACA in 2024:
"In the past six months, we have really been confirmed that what we do together in the studio, on stage and as friends is exactly the right thing. We have a lot of new music and energy to show you all in the coming years. We will start at Loppen and at the SPOT Festival in 2024 and look forward to being with everyone who joins in!”

posts.title: Joywave
posts.body:
Dive into a world of electrifying sound and limitless creativity when the American trio Joywave takes over the Pumpehuset in Copenhagen
Joywave consists of vocalist/multi-instrumentalist Daniel Armbruster, guitarist Joseph Morinelli and drummer Paul Brenner. They are now ready with their fifth studio album, "Permanent Pleasure", which will be released on Friday 17 May. Here they delve deeper into guitar and string sections without sacrificing the signature sound that has endeared the band to countless fans over the past years, and which has established them as a band you can just as easily hear in a hip record store as in the grocery store.
Oplev dem live i Pumpehuset d. 12. november 2024.

posts.title: Two Another
posts.body:
The electropop sensation Two Another is back in town
The temperature will be high and the pop party total when Two Another fills Pumpehuset with their smooth and groovy electropop, which includes draws inspiration from 60s soul, alternative R&B, 80s funk and modern electronic pop.
The Danish music lovers who went in vain the last time Two Another played in a sold-out Ideal Bar can now rejoice that the English-American duo will soon follow up on the success. On 19 November, they give their biggest Danish concert to date, when they fire up the Pump House.
The story of Two Another's origin begins under the Australian sun. British-born Angus Campbell and American Eliot Porter met through a music program run by the electronic duo Bag Raiders at their school in Sydney. They quickly found the melody in their shared love of indie pop, French electro, dance and hip-hop. After finishing school, they traveled separately in Australia and Europe before meeting in London in 2015 to form Two Another.
After millions of streams and a successful release with the EP "Another Tape" (2018), Two Another's debut album "Back to Us" landed in 2022. Here, the duo proclaims their love for R&B-sounding melodies, groovy funk bass and alternative pop.
Their latest release is the EP "FRESHMAN", which was released in April 2024 and is filled with excellent mellow laid back sunshine pop, which will act as the perfect soundtrack for the autumn concert visit.

posts.title: Gatecreeper
posts.body:
Mighty Gatecreeper takes the Pump House with 200 Stab Wounds and Enforced
Gatecreeper is not just an American death metal band; it is a powerhouse of explosive sound and gloomy atmospheres, led by vocalist Chase H. Mason, with Eric Wagner and Israel Garza on guitar, Metal Matt Arrebollo on drums and Alex Brown on bass. At the heart of the roaring wave of American death metal, Gatecreeper are poised to challenge the status quo with a new album on the horizon. Hitting the streets in May 2024, "Dark Superstition" promises to demonstrate Gatecreeper's ability to carve their own unique path through the genre. "We've been fine-tuning the song structures," explains Mason. "We are getting better at what we do". "Dark Superstition" explores themes of the supernatural, divination, fear of the unknown and magic. The title is also a tribute to a mountain range of the same name located in the band's home state of Arizona - a beautiful but fateful place shrouded in legend. Recorded at God City Studios in Salem, Massachusetts, with Kurt Ballou of Converge at the helm, the album represents a fusion of Gatecreeper's experience, musical finesse and love of death metal. "There are a lot of bands in our lane," says Mason, "but we try to create our own."
Since their inception in 2013, Gatecreeper have consistently pushed the boundaries of death metal. Their 2014 self-titled EP cemented their status as credible interpreters of the old school. After signing with Relapse Records, they released their debut album "Sonoran Depravation" in 2016, which led to tours with bands such as Cannibal Corpse and Power Trip. In 2019, the world saw "Deserted", the album that earned them third place on Decibel Magazine's prestigious list of the 40 best albums of the year. 2022 brought them on Decibel Magazine's tour alongside Obituary and Municipal Waste.
Today, Gatecreeper is an iconic name in the world of death metal, touring globally under their own banner. Get a taste of their powerful and raw death metal when they take the stage at Pumpehuset on November 24, 2024.

posts.title: Veil Of Maya + Signs Of The Swarm
posts.body:
Get ready for Pins & Knuckles Faces Of Death Tour 2024, where Veil Of Maya and Signs Of The Swarm rock the Pump House with a double-header show on November 20, 2024
Veil of Maya
is an American metalcore band formed in Chicago, Illinois in 2004. The band is known for their unique fusion of metalcore and progressive metal, creating a technically advanced and complex sound.
Veil of Maya is known for their technically skilled musicians, especially guitarist Marc Okubo, who is recognized for his advanced riffing. The band has also integrated electronic elements into their later releases, giving their music a more futuristic and modern feel.
Signs of the Swarm
is an American deathcore band from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The band was formed in 2014 and is known for their intense and brutal style of music. Their sound is characterized by heavy riffs, fast blast beats and deep growls, which are typical of the deathcore genre.
The band has released several albums and EPs since their inception. They debuted with the album "Senseless Order" in 2016 and have since then developed and refined their sound through several releases. Signs of the Swarm are known for experimenting with different sonic elements within deathcore and have built a solid reputation in the underground for their uncompromising approach to the genre.
Experience Veil Of Maya and Signs Of The Swarm in connection with their Pins & Knuckles Faces Of Death Tour 2024. They bring To The Grave and Varials as support.

After signing with Relapse Records, they released their debut album "Sonoran Depravation" in 2016, which led to tours with bands such as Cannibal Corpse and Power Trip. In 2019, the world saw "Deserted", the album that earned them third place on Decibel Magazine's prestigious list of the 40 best albums of the year. 2022 brought them on Decibel Magazine's tour alongside Obituary and Municipal Waste.
Today, Gatecreeper is an iconic name in the world of death metal, touring globally under their own banner. Get a taste of their powerful and raw death metal when they take the stage at Pumpehuset on November 24, 2024.

posts.title: Trentemøller
posts.body:
Trentemøller will occupy the Pumpehuset three nights in a row this autumn
Three magical evenings await with one of Denmark's and the world's great masters of electronic atmosphere when Trentemøller swings his tour past Pumpehuset on 31 October, 1 and 2 November 2024.
Trentemøller has enchanted his live audiences with his unique soundscapes and memorable melodies over the past two decades. With more than 500 shows worldwide, he has established himself as a true master of his craft. His music represents a continuously evolving range of themes and ideas, and his shows consistently push the boundaries of what we expect from live music.
Whether you're a long-time fan or he's a new acquaintance, you can't miss Trentemøller's live performances with a full band. The band consists of Disa Jakobs on vocals, guitar and synthesizers, Silas Tinglef on drums and guitar, Brian Batz on guitar, Jacob Haubjerg on bass and Anders Trentemøller on synthesizers.
Trentemøllers debut-fuldlængde album, "The Last Resort", blev udgivet i 2006 efter en række EP'er og introducerede Trentemøllers musik til et bredere publikum. Den seneste udgivelse, "Memoria", hans sjette studiealbum, indeholder dyster, introspektive stykker, motorik, drømmepop, støjrock og elektronisk pop. Han fortsætter med at arbejde med velkendte temaer om lys og mørke, turbulens og ro, skærende kulde og trøstende varme, tydeligt inspireret af de modsatte elementer i den nordiske omgivelse, han kalder hjem. Han går meget længere ind i dette velkendte territorium, samtidig med at han undersøger nye temaer.
In recent years, Trentemøller has also remixed music by artists such as Tricky, Savages, Depeche Mode, Franz Ferdinand, The Knife, A Place To Bury Strangers, Soft Moon, UNKLE, adding to a list of over a hundred previously released remixes.

posts.title: Joywave
posts.body:
Dive into a world of electrifying sound and limitless creativity when the American trio Joywave takes over the Pumpehuset in Copenhagen
Joywave consists of vocalist/multi-instrumentalist Daniel Armbruster, guitarist Joseph Morinelli and drummer Paul Brenner. They are now ready with their fifth studio album, "Permanent Pleasure", which will be released on Friday 17 May. Here they delve deeper into guitar and string sections without sacrificing the signature sound that has endeared the band to countless fans over the past years, and which has established them as a band you can just as easily hear in a hip record store as in the grocery store.
Oplev dem live i Pumpehuset d. 12. november 2024.

posts.title: Veil Of Maya + Signs Of The Swarm
posts.body:
Get ready for Pins & Knuckles Faces Of Death Tour 2024, where Veil Of Maya and Signs Of The Swarm rock the Pump House with a double-header show on November 20, 2024
Veil of Maya
is an American metalcore band formed in Chicago, Illinois in 2004. The band is known for their unique fusion of metalcore and progressive metal, creating a technically advanced and complex sound.
Veil of Maya is known for their technically skilled musicians, especially guitarist Marc Okubo, who is recognized for his advanced riffing. The band has also integrated electronic elements into their later releases, giving their music a more futuristic and modern feel.
Signs of the Swarm
is an American deathcore band from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The band was formed in 2014 and is known for their intense and brutal style of music. Their sound is characterized by heavy riffs, fast blast beats and deep growls, which are typical of the deathcore genre.
The band has released several albums and EPs since their inception. They debuted with the album "Senseless Order" in 2016 and have since then developed and refined their sound through several releases. Signs of the Swarm are known for experimenting with different sonic elements within deathcore and have built a solid reputation in the underground for their uncompromising approach to the genre.
Experience Veil Of Maya and Signs Of The Swarm in connection with their Pins & Knuckles Faces Of Death Tour 2024. They bring To The Grave and Varials as support.

posts.title: You Me At Six
posts.body:
There is British pop punk in a special class for November
You Me at Six is ​​a British rock band from Surrey, England, in 2004. The band consists of Josh Franceschi (vocals), Max Helyer (guitar), Chris Miller (guitar), Matt Barnes (bass) and Dan Flint (drums). They met through school and formed their band while still teenagers in 2004, inspired by bands like Fall Out Boy and blink-182.
They got their first taste of success with their debut album, "Take Off Your Colours", which was released in 2008. The album received positive reviews and helped establish them as one of the UK's leading pop-punk bands. Singles such as "Save It for the Bedroom" and "Finders Keepers" became particularly popular with fans. Since then, their musical style has evolved from pop-punk to a more varied sound that includes elements of alternative rock and pop rock. The band has toured all over the world and played at major festivals and arenas. They have built up a dedicated following of fans with the help of their energetic live performances and moving lyrics.

posts.title: Two Another
posts.body:
The electropop sensation Two Another is back in town
The temperature will be high and the pop party total when Two Another fills Pumpehuset with their smooth and groovy electropop, which includes draws inspiration from 60s soul, alternative R&B, 80s funk and modern electronic pop.
The Danish music lovers who went in vain the last time Two Another played in a sold-out Ideal Bar can now rejoice that the English-American duo will soon follow up on the success. On 19 November, they give their biggest Danish concert to date, when they fire up the Pump House.
The story of Two Another's origin begins under the Australian sun. British-born Angus Campbell and American Eliot Porter met through a music program run by the electronic duo Bag Raiders at their school in Sydney. They quickly found the melody in their shared love of indie pop, French electro, dance and hip-hop. After finishing school, they traveled separately in Australia and Europe before meeting in London in 2015 to form Two Another.
After millions of streams and a successful release with the EP "Another Tape" (2018), Two Another's debut album "Back to Us" landed in 2022. Here, the duo proclaims their love for R&B-sounding melodies, groovy funk bass and alternative pop.
Their latest release is the EP "FRESHMAN", which was released in April 2024 and is filled with excellent mellow laid back sunshine pop, which will act as the perfect soundtrack for the autumn concert visit.

posts.title: Gatecreeper
posts.body:
Mighty Gatecreeper takes the Pump House with 200 Stab Wounds and Enforced
Gatecreeper is not just an American death metal band; it is a powerhouse of explosive sound and gloomy atmospheres, led by vocalist Chase H. Mason, with Eric Wagner and Israel Garza on guitar, Metal Matt Arrebollo on drums and Alex Brown on bass. At the heart of the roaring wave of American death metal, Gatecreeper are poised to challenge the status quo with a new album on the horizon. Hitting the streets in May 2024, "Dark Superstition" promises to demonstrate Gatecreeper's ability to carve their own unique path through the genre. "We've been fine-tuning the song structures," explains Mason. "We are getting better at what we do". "Dark Superstition" explores themes of the supernatural, divination, fear of the unknown and magic. The title is also a tribute to a mountain range of the same name located in the band's home state of Arizona - a beautiful but fateful place shrouded in legend. Recorded at God City Studios in Salem, Massachusetts, with Kurt Ballou of Converge at the helm, the album represents a fusion of Gatecreeper's experience, musical finesse and love of death metal. "There are a lot of bands in our lane," says Mason, "but we try to create our own."
Since their inception in 2013, Gatecreeper have consistently pushed the boundaries of death metal. Their 2014 self-titled EP cemented their status as credible interpreters of the old school. After signing with Relapse Records, they released their debut album "Sonoran Depravation" in 2016, which led to tours with bands such as Cannibal Corpse and Power Trip. In 2019, the world saw "Deserted", the album that earned them third place on Decibel Magazine's prestigious list of the 40 best albums of the year. 2022 brought them on Decibel Magazine's tour alongside Obituary and Municipal Waste.
Today, Gatecreeper is an iconic name in the world of death metal, touring globally under their own banner. Get a taste of their powerful and raw death metal when they take the stage at Pumpehuset on November 24, 2024.

posts.title: Trentemøller
posts.body:
Trentemøller will occupy the Pumpehuset three nights in a row this autumn
Three magical evenings await with one of Denmark's and the world's great masters of electronic atmosphere when Trentemøller swings his tour past Pumpehuset on 31 October, 1 and 2 November 2024.
Trentemøller has enchanted his live audiences with his unique soundscapes and memorable melodies over the past two decades. With more than 500 shows worldwide, he has established himself as a true master of his craft. His music represents a continuously evolving range of themes and ideas, and his shows consistently push the boundaries of what we expect from live music.
Whether you're a long-time fan or he's a new acquaintance, you can't miss Trentemøller's live performances with a full band. The band consists of Disa Jakobs on vocals, guitar and synthesizers, Silas Tinglef on drums and guitar, Brian Batz on guitar, Jacob Haubjerg on bass and Anders Trentemøller on synthesizers.
Trentemøllers debut-fuldlængde album, "The Last Resort", blev udgivet i 2006 efter en række EP'er og introducerede Trentemøllers musik til et bredere publikum. Den seneste udgivelse, "Memoria", hans sjette studiealbum, indeholder dyster, introspektive stykker, motorik, drømmepop, støjrock og elektronisk pop. Han fortsætter med at arbejde med velkendte temaer om lys og mørke, turbulens og ro, skærende kulde og trøstende varme, tydeligt inspireret af de modsatte elementer i den nordiske omgivelse, han kalder hjem. Han går meget længere ind i dette velkendte territorium, samtidig med at han undersøger nye temaer.
In recent years, Trentemøller has also remixed music by artists such as Tricky, Savages, Depeche Mode, Franz Ferdinand, The Knife, A Place To Bury Strangers, Soft Moon, UNKLE, adding to a list of over a hundred previously released remixes.

posts.title: Veil Of Maya + Signs Of The Swarm
posts.body:
Get ready for Pins & Knuckles Faces Of Death Tour 2024, where Veil Of Maya and Signs Of The Swarm rock the Pump House with a double-header show on November 20, 2024
Veil of Maya
is an American metalcore band formed in Chicago, Illinois in 2004. The band is known for their unique fusion of metalcore and progressive metal, creating a technically advanced and complex sound.
Veil of Maya is known for their technically skilled musicians, especially guitarist Marc Okubo, who is recognized for his advanced riffing. The band has also integrated electronic elements into their later releases, giving their music a more futuristic and modern feel.
Signs of the Swarm
is an American deathcore band from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The band was formed in 2014 and is known for their intense and brutal style of music. Their sound is characterized by heavy riffs, fast blast beats and deep growls, which are typical of the deathcore genre.
The band has released several albums and EPs since their inception. They debuted with the album "Senseless Order" in 2016 and have since then developed and refined their sound through several releases. Signs of the Swarm are known for experimenting with different sonic elements within deathcore and have built a solid reputation in the underground for their uncompromising approach to the genre.
Experience Veil Of Maya and Signs Of The Swarm in connection with their Pins & Knuckles Faces Of Death Tour 2024. They bring To The Grave and Varials as support.

posts.title: Gatecreeper
posts.body:
Mighty Gatecreeper takes the Pump House with 200 Stab Wounds and Enforced
Gatecreeper is not just an American death metal band; it is a powerhouse of explosive sound and gloomy atmospheres, led by vocalist Chase H. Mason, with Eric Wagner and Israel Garza on guitar, Metal Matt Arrebollo on drums and Alex Brown on bass. At the heart of the roaring wave of American death metal, Gatecreeper are poised to challenge the status quo with a new album on the horizon. Hitting the streets in May 2024, "Dark Superstition" promises to demonstrate Gatecreeper's ability to carve their own unique path through the genre. "We've been fine-tuning the song structures," explains Mason. "We are getting better at what we do". "Dark Superstition" explores themes of the supernatural, divination, fear of the unknown and magic. The title is also a tribute to a mountain range of the same name located in the band's home state of Arizona - a beautiful but fateful place shrouded in legend. Recorded at God City Studios in Salem, Massachusetts, with Kurt Ballou of Converge at the helm, the album represents a fusion of Gatecreeper's experience, musical finesse and love of death metal. "There are a lot of bands in our lane," says Mason, "but we try to create our own."
Since their inception in 2013, Gatecreeper have consistently pushed the boundaries of death metal. Their 2014 self-titled EP cemented their status as credible interpreters of the old school. After signing with Relapse Records, they released their debut album "Sonoran Depravation" in 2016, which led to tours with bands such as Cannibal Corpse and Power Trip. In 2019, the world saw "Deserted", the album that earned them third place on Decibel Magazine's prestigious list of the 40 best albums of the year. 2022 brought them on Decibel Magazine's tour alongside Obituary and Municipal Waste.
Today, Gatecreeper is an iconic name in the world of death metal, touring globally under their own banner. Get a taste of their powerful and raw death metal when they take the stage at Pumpehuset on November 24, 2024.

posts.title: Pind
posts.body:
PIND is back with new music and a concert in Pumpehuset
With the energetic single 'Ups', which helps to emphasize what he has up his sleeve for the coming time, PIND has already started his musical year in 2024. The last year has been spent in the studio, fully focused , and the resulting new music is ready to see the light of day. It is in many ways a completely new PIND, but at the same time exactly as we know him, as a hard-nosed lyricist with an undeniable musical talent. PIND takes the new music and the known talent with him when he visits 11 Danish venues with his band in autumn 2024.
PIND already has its merits, such as the introduction to its unique universe the EP Videre (2019), which i.a. offers the singles Indlæg and Plastic ft. Benjamin Hav, as well as his lyrical debut album LOTUS (2022). The common thread through it all, and the inevitable element of PIND as an artist, are the hard-hitting, well-produced beats, combined with his strong lyricism, which hits exactly where it should. And as always, the music is written and produced by PIND himself.

posts.title: Therapy?
posts.body:
The Northern Irish rock trio celebrates 30 years
Therapy? is a Northern Irish rock band from Larne, formed in 1989 by guitarist and vocalist Andy Cairns. In addition to Cairns, the band consists of Michael McKeegan on bass and vocals and Neil Cooper on drums. The band is famous for their unique fusion of punk, alternative and hard rock, often characterized by intense guitars, sharp lyrics and energetic performances.
The band debuted with the album "Babyteeth" in 1991, marking the beginning of a long and successful career. However, they first gained international recognition with the release of the album "Troublegum" in 1994, for which they are celebrating their 30th anniversary this year. "Troublegum" contains hits like "Screamager" and "Nowhere".
Over the years, the band has released several albums, including "Infernal Love" (1995), "High Anxiety" (2003) and "Hard Cold Fire" (2023), spanning a wide spectrum of genres, from alternative rock and punk to industrial and acoustic music. Their lyrics are often deeply personal and touch on topics such as mental health, relationships and social problems.
Experience Therapy? live in Pumpehuset when they hit Copenhagen on 27 November 2024.

posts.title: BEAK>
posts.body:
Portishead legend Geoff Barrow visits Pumpehuset
The style-creating trip-hop band's beatmaker gives a concert with his krautrock-cultivating band Beak> on November 29 in Pumpehuset.
Few musicians can boast of having created such a masterful musical testament as Geoff Barrow has created as a member of Portishead. But the English musician, producer and DJ is not the type to rest on his laurels. On the contrary, his career outside the legendary Bristol group is characterized by an uncompromising artistic quest that has taken him in several genre directions. Portishead's three studio albums "Dummy" (1994), "Portishead" (1997) and "Third" (2008) are, with their melancholic and soul-searching metropolitan blues, untouchable monoliths in modern popular music and largely characterized by Geoff Barrow's geeky and stylish production wizardry.
After the group's third album came out, he formed the group Beak> to get an outlet for other sides of his musical creative urge. It initially resulted in the self-titled 2009 debut, written and recorded in just 12 days, which is a terrific consciousness-expanding listening experience with delicate references to 70s German krautrock. Since then, the group has released three strong, psychedelic fluorescent studio albums - most recently ">>>" from 2018 - as well as the soundtrack for the film "Couple in a Hole" (2016) and most recently something as special as a soundtrack for a graphic novel, "Cosmic Music ” from 2022.
Geoff Barrow also has the hip-hop project Quakers, has remixed Run The Jewels and worked with artists such as Arcade Fire, Neneh Cherry, The Horrors and The Coral. He has also made music for e.g. The Banksy documentary "Exit Through the Gift Shop", the Netflix series "Black Mirror" and the science fiction films "Ex Machina" and "Annihilation".
In 2020, Beak> visited Denmark for the first time, where Undertoner's reviewer awarded the concert 4.5 out of 6 U's and concluded that Beak> was "Satan's good company". Now the group's Danish fans and other kraut aficionados can once again experience Barrow and co. live here at home, when they envelop the Pumpehuset in cosmic tones on 29 November.

posts.title: Blues Pills
posts.body:
Roaring Swedish rock awaits until November
Blues Pills are back with their signature blend of explosive live shows and timeless songs that have won countless fans around the world with their modern take on classic rock. After almost ten years of success with the albums ’’Blues Pills’’ (2014) “Lady In Gold” (2016), and “Holy Moly!” (2020) Blues Pills is now ready to present their fourth studio album "Birthday".
The band describes their new album, "Birthday", as a liberating work where they have left all limitations and expectations behind to create music they truly love. They wanted to capture the raw and authentic vibe of their live performances on the record while challenging themselves to create the best they've ever done. Elin Larsson, the band's charismatic lead singer, discovered during the recordings that she was pregnant, which added an extra dimension to the process and strengthened the band's feminist stance: "During the recordings of the album I discovered I was pregnant. It wasn’t planned so I was a bit overwhelmed and it changed a lot but it actually made it easier for me to write for this album. With all the hormones I was way more emotional than usual, and I wanted to continue with my life even though I'm bringing a kid into the world. It should be natural to be both a mother and an artist, and I want my son Loui to be on that journey with me.”
Blues Pills' new album "Birthday" was written and recorded in Sweden's idyllic landscapes and in Recordia Studios. Produced by acclaimed songwriter and studio guru Fredrik Häggstam, there's an irresistible energy and live feel to Blues Pills' new album, which shows a confidence in their ability to create compelling new releases without tinkering with the explosive formula that provided them their start.

posts.title: LYDSYN
posts.body:
Denmark's king of acid rock, Uffe Lorenzen, is back in Pumpehuset with LYDSYN
LYDSYN is ready to bring their high voltage rock show on the road in the fall of 2024. The band is currently working on their next album in the legendary Sweet Silence Studio. This autumn, it will therefore be with a brand new album in their luggage when they visit Pumpehuset once again.
The trio's new album is produced by Flemming Rasmussen (Metallica, Gasolin', Sort Sol etc.) and this time LYDSYN has chosen the hard way. The tracks are even more cash than the debut record. The hard rock has been turned up and the psychedelic tendencies down.
LYDSYN is a tight playing power trio, dedicated to a pure analog sound experience, free of backing tracks, clicks, samples, auto-tune, and "all the other shit," as they put it themselves. The concerts are not well-choreographed shows, but unique rock concerts that can go either way, depending on the mood, place and audience.
As a band that has established itself as an inescapable force on the Danish rock scene, LYDSYN has played in several places large and small - everything from Ølluminati to Copenhell to ThyLejr Festival to Store Vega and Pumpehuset and the group was on vinyl for many weeks -10 when they released their debut album in 2022.
The power trio consists of Uffe Lorenzen (Baby Woodrose, Spits Nøgenhat) on guitar and vocals, Palle Demant (Hjortene/The Sledge) on bass, and Jens Eyde on drums.

posts.title: Wheel
posts.body:
Wheel serves Finnish prog from the top shelf in mid-December
Wheel is a Finnish prog-metal band from Helsinki, consisting of James Lascelles (vocals/guitar), Santeri Saksala (drums) and Jussi Turunen (lead guitar).
Since they started in 2015, Wheel has quickly grown from underdogs in Helsinki to an internationally recognized band. The trio's 2019 debut album, ''Moving Backwards,'' was immediately embraced by fans of mega-acts like Tool and Coheed & Cambria, as the album features elements like angular riffs, unforgettable melodies, and adventurous scope. The 2021 sequel, Resident Human, also received praise from critics worldwide for its sonic evolution and dystopian themes.
Wheel will go on a European tour in 2024 and in this connection they will visit Pumpehuset on December 11, 2024.

posts.title: Smash Into Pieces
posts.body:
Experience the Swedish rock phenomenon Smash Into Pieces at Pumpehuset on 8 December 2024
Get ready for an enchanting journey with SMASH INTO PIECES, the Swedish band who have captured the heart of the rock scene since the release of their acclaimed album 'Rise And Shine'. Led by the energetic drummer APOC, they have achieved international recognition and an impressive third place in the Swedish Eurovision final after a semi-final win.
Their hit single 'Six Feet Under' achieved platinum status in record time in Sweden, and with their unique ARCADIA universe, SMASH INTO PIECES is ready to take you on an unforgettable musical journey. Here, as usual, they will create an electrifying concert experience and will cement their place as one of the most exciting names in cinematic rock.
SMASH INTO PIECES continues to soar towards new heights. Their dedication and expertise in every aspect of their career guarantees an unforgettable experience for both established and new fans. Don't miss the chance to experience them at Pumpehuset on 8 December 2024.

posts.title: Dark Tranquillity
posts.body:
The Swedish melodic death metal band, Dark Tranquility, bring down the Pump House with a strong support line-up November 24, 2024
Dark Tranquility is a Swedish melodic death metal band formed in Gothenburg in 1989. They are considered pioneers of the melodic death metal genre and have had a significant influence on many other bands in the metal world.
The band was formed by guitarists Niklas Sundin and Mikael Stanne, as well as bassist Martin Henriksson. Over the years, the band has gone through several member changes, but Stanne has remained the most prominent member.
Dark Tranquility is known for their complex guitar arrangements, atmospheric keyboard tracks and Stanne's signature growls. Their lyrics often touch on existential and philosophical themes, which has earned them a loyal fan base all over the world.
Over the years, Dark Tranquility has toured extensively around the world and performed at major festivals such as Wacken Open Air and Download Festival. Their energetic live performances and dedication to their fans have contributed to their long-lasting popularity.
Dark Tranquility has released twelve studio albums to date, each with its own unique sound and musical expression. Of particular note here is "The Gallery" (1995), considered by many fans to be a high point of the band's career with its mix of aggression and melody, and "Damage Done" (2002), a return to the band's earlier sound with a focus on fast riffs and intensity.
The band announces that a new album "Endtime Signals" is on the way, and they promise to continue challenging the boundaries of melodic death metal.
Experience Dark Tranquility in November at Pumpehuset together with Moonspeel, Wolftheart and Hiraes.

posts.title: Kanonenfieber
posts.body:
Kanonenfieber annoncerer EU Headline Tour 2024 og i denne forbindelse kommer de forbi København i Pumpehuset 4. december
Kanonenfieber er et tysk black metal-band fra Bamberg grundlagt i 2020. Bandets leder og dets eneste medlem er en musiker med kunstnernavnet ’’Noise". Til live-koncerter bliver han ledsaget af gæstemusikere, hvor han kun fokuserer på at synge. I studiet indspiller han dog alle instrumenterne selv.
Udgangspunktet for Kanonenfieber var en udveksling mellem Noise og hans historiker-ven om at skrive et album om Første Verdenskrig baseret på breve og originale dokumenter fra perioden. Noise blev især motiveret til at danne bandet efter at have læst sin afdøde oldefars dagbog, som han skrev ved frontlinjen under Første Verdenskrig.
Musikken er præget af en mørk, aggressiv lyd, som er typisk for genren, mens den inkorporerer melodiske elementer og episke kompositioner, der giver dybde til lydbilledet.
Kanonenfieber udgav første album, “Menschenmühle”, i 2021. Siden da har bandet spillet flere meget succesfulde turnéer, og deres omfattende, dramatiske live-shows har rystet publikum og efterladt dem målløse på anerkendte festivaler som Summer Breeze, Party.San eller Dong Open Air.
Noise og hans liveband, holdes bevidst anonyme, hvilket fungerer som en reference til "Den ukendte soldats grav". Dette er monumenter i forskellige lande verden over, der mindes soldater dræbt i krige.
Gå ikke glip af et dramatisk liveshow og oplev Kanonenfieber 4. december 2024 i Pumpehuset.

Over the years, the band has released several albums, including "Infernal Love" (1995), "High Anxiety" (2003) and "Hard Cold Fire" (2023), spanning a wide spectrum of genres, from alternative rock and punk to industrial and acoustic music. Their lyrics are often deeply personal and touch on topics such as mental health, relationships and social problems.
Experience Therapy? live in Pumpehuset when they hit Copenhagen on 27 November 2024.

posts.title: Therapy?
posts.body:
The Northern Irish rock trio celebrates 30 years
Therapy? is a Northern Irish rock band from Larne, formed in 1989 by guitarist and vocalist Andy Cairns. In addition to Cairns, the band consists of Michael McKeegan on bass and vocals and Neil Cooper on drums. The band is famous for their unique fusion of punk, alternative and hard rock, often characterized by intense guitars, sharp lyrics and energetic performances.
The band debuted with the album "Babyteeth" in 1991, marking the beginning of a long and successful career. However, they first gained international recognition with the release of the album "Troublegum" in 1994, for which they are celebrating their 30th anniversary this year. "Troublegum" contains hits like "Screamager" and "Nowhere".
Over the years, the band has released several albums, including "Infernal Love" (1995), "High Anxiety" (2003) and "Hard Cold Fire" (2023), spanning a wide spectrum of genres, from alternative rock and punk to industrial and acoustic music. Their lyrics are often deeply personal and touch on topics such as mental health, relationships and social problems.
Experience Therapy? live in Pumpehuset when they hit Copenhagen on 27 November 2024.

posts.title: BEAK>
posts.body:
Portishead legend Geoff Barrow visits Pumpehuset
The style-creating trip-hop band's beatmaker gives a concert with his krautrock-cultivating band Beak> on November 29 in Pumpehuset.
Few musicians can boast of having created such a masterful musical testament as Geoff Barrow has created as a member of Portishead. But the English musician, producer and DJ is not the type to rest on his laurels. On the contrary, his career outside the legendary Bristol group is characterized by an uncompromising artistic quest that has taken him in several genre directions. Portishead's three studio albums "Dummy" (1994), "Portishead" (1997) and "Third" (2008) are, with their melancholic and soul-searching metropolitan blues, untouchable monoliths in modern popular music and largely characterized by Geoff Barrow's geeky and stylish production wizardry.
After the group's third album came out, he formed the group Beak> to get an outlet for other sides of his musical creative urge. It initially resulted in the self-titled 2009 debut, written and recorded in just 12 days, which is a terrific consciousness-expanding listening experience with delicate references to 70s German krautrock. Since then, the group has released three strong, psychedelic fluorescent studio albums - most recently ">>>" from 2018 - as well as the soundtrack for the film "Couple in a Hole" (2016) and most recently something as special as a soundtrack for a graphic novel, "Cosmic Music ” from 2022.
Geoff Barrow also has the hip-hop project Quakers, has remixed Run The Jewels and worked with artists such as Arcade Fire, Neneh Cherry, The Horrors and The Coral. He has also made music for e.g. The Banksy documentary "Exit Through the Gift Shop", the Netflix series "Black Mirror" and the science fiction films "Ex Machina" and "Annihilation".
In 2020, Beak> visited Denmark for the first time, where Undertoner's reviewer awarded the concert 4.5 out of 6 U's and concluded that Beak> was "Satan's good company". Now the group's Danish fans and other kraut aficionados can once again experience Barrow and co. live here at home, when they envelop the Pumpehuset in cosmic tones on 29 November.

posts.title: Kanonenfieber
posts.body:
Kanonenfieber annoncerer EU Headline Tour 2024 og i denne forbindelse kommer de forbi København i Pumpehuset 4. december
Kanonenfieber er et tysk black metal-band fra Bamberg grundlagt i 2020. Bandets leder og dets eneste medlem er en musiker med kunstnernavnet ’’Noise". Til live-koncerter bliver han ledsaget af gæstemusikere, hvor han kun fokuserer på at synge. I studiet indspiller han dog alle instrumenterne selv.
Udgangspunktet for Kanonenfieber var en udveksling mellem Noise og hans historiker-ven om at skrive et album om Første Verdenskrig baseret på breve og originale dokumenter fra perioden. Noise blev især motiveret til at danne bandet efter at have læst sin afdøde oldefars dagbog, som han skrev ved frontlinjen under Første Verdenskrig.
Musikken er præget af en mørk, aggressiv lyd, som er typisk for genren, mens den inkorporerer melodiske elementer og episke kompositioner, der giver dybde til lydbilledet.
Kanonenfieber udgav første album, “Menschenmühle”, i 2021. Siden da har bandet spillet flere meget succesfulde turnéer, og deres omfattende, dramatiske live-shows har rystet publikum og efterladt dem målløse på anerkendte festivaler som Summer Breeze, Party.San eller Dong Open Air.
Noise og hans liveband, holdes bevidst anonyme, hvilket fungerer som en reference til "Den ukendte soldats grav". Dette er monumenter i forskellige lande verden over, der mindes soldater dræbt i krige.
Gå ikke glip af et dramatisk liveshow og oplev Kanonenfieber 4. december 2024 i Pumpehuset.

posts.title: Smash Into Pieces
posts.body:
Experience the Swedish rock phenomenon Smash Into Pieces at Pumpehuset on 8 December 2024
Get ready for an enchanting journey with SMASH INTO PIECES, the Swedish band who have captured the heart of the rock scene since the release of their acclaimed album 'Rise And Shine'. Led by the energetic drummer APOC, they have achieved international recognition and an impressive third place in the Swedish Eurovision final after a semi-final win.
Their hit single 'Six Feet Under' achieved platinum status in record time in Sweden, and with their unique ARCADIA universe, SMASH INTO PIECES is ready to take you on an unforgettable musical journey. Here, as usual, they will create an electrifying concert experience and will cement their place as one of the most exciting names in cinematic rock.
SMASH INTO PIECES continues to soar towards new heights. Their dedication and expertise in every aspect of their career guarantees an unforgettable experience for both established and new fans. Don't miss the chance to experience them at Pumpehuset on 8 December 2024.

posts.title: Wheel
posts.body:
Wheel serves Finnish prog from the top shelf in mid-December
Wheel is a Finnish prog-metal band from Helsinki, consisting of James Lascelles (vocals/guitar), Santeri Saksala (drums) and Jussi Turunen (lead guitar).
Since they started in 2015, Wheel has quickly grown from underdogs in Helsinki to an internationally recognized band. The trio's 2019 debut album, ''Moving Backwards,'' was immediately embraced by fans of mega-acts like Tool and Coheed & Cambria, as the album features elements like angular riffs, unforgettable melodies, and adventurous scope. The 2021 sequel, Resident Human, also received praise from critics worldwide for its sonic evolution and dystopian themes.
Wheel will go on a European tour in 2024 and in this connection they will visit Pumpehuset on December 11, 2024.

posts.title: LYDSYN
posts.body:
Denmark's king of acid rock, Uffe Lorenzen, is back in Pumpehuset with LYDSYN
LYDSYN is ready to bring their high voltage rock show on the road in the fall of 2024. The band is currently working on their next album in the legendary Sweet Silence Studio. This autumn, it will therefore be with a brand new album in their luggage when they visit Pumpehuset once again.
The trio's new album is produced by Flemming Rasmussen (Metallica, Gasolin', Sort Sol etc.) and this time LYDSYN has chosen the hard way. The tracks are even more cash than the debut record. The hard rock has been turned up and the psychedelic tendencies down.
LYDSYN is a tight playing power trio, dedicated to a pure analog sound experience, free of backing tracks, clicks, samples, auto-tune, and "all the other shit," as they put it themselves. The concerts are not well-choreographed shows, but unique rock concerts that can go either way, depending on the mood, place and audience.
As a band that has established itself as an inescapable force on the Danish rock scene, LYDSYN has played in several places large and small - everything from Ølluminati to Copenhell to ThyLejr Festival to Store Vega and Pumpehuset and the group was on vinyl for many weeks -10 when they released their debut album in 2022.
The power trio consists of Uffe Lorenzen (Baby Woodrose, Spits Nøgenhat) on guitar and vocals, Palle Demant (Hjortene/The Sledge) on bass, and Jens Eyde on drums.

posts.title: Blues Pills
posts.body:
Roaring Swedish rock awaits until November
Blues Pills are back with their signature blend of explosive live shows and timeless songs that have won countless fans around the world with their modern take on classic rock. After almost ten years of success with the albums ’’Blues Pills’’ (2014) “Lady In Gold” (2016), and “Holy Moly!” (2020) Blues Pills is now ready to present their fourth studio album "Birthday".
The band describes their new album, "Birthday", as a liberating work where they have left all limitations and expectations behind to create music they truly love. They wanted to capture the raw and authentic vibe of their live performances on the record while challenging themselves to create the best they've ever done. Elin Larsson, the band's charismatic lead singer, discovered during the recordings that she was pregnant, which added an extra dimension to the process and strengthened the band's feminist stance: "During the recordings of the album I discovered I was pregnant. It wasn’t planned so I was a bit overwhelmed and it changed a lot but it actually made it easier for me to write for this album. With all the hormones I was way more emotional than usual, and I wanted to continue with my life even though I'm bringing a kid into the world. It should be natural to be both a mother and an artist, and I want my son Loui to be on that journey with me.”
Blues Pills' new album "Birthday" was written and recorded in Sweden's idyllic landscapes and in Recordia Studios. Produced by acclaimed songwriter and studio guru Fredrik Häggstam, there's an irresistible energy and live feel to Blues Pills' new album, which shows a confidence in their ability to create compelling new releases without tinkering with the explosive formula that provided them their start.

posts.title: Dark Tranquillity
posts.body:
The Swedish melodic death metal band, Dark Tranquility, bring down the Pump House with a strong support line-up November 24, 2024
Dark Tranquility is a Swedish melodic death metal band formed in Gothenburg in 1989. They are considered pioneers of the melodic death metal genre and have had a significant influence on many other bands in the metal world.
The band was formed by guitarists Niklas Sundin and Mikael Stanne, as well as bassist Martin Henriksson. Over the years, the band has gone through several member changes, but Stanne has remained the most prominent member.
Dark Tranquility is known for their complex guitar arrangements, atmospheric keyboard tracks and Stanne's signature growls. Their lyrics often touch on existential and philosophical themes, which has earned them a loyal fan base all over the world.
Over the years, Dark Tranquility has toured extensively around the world and performed at major festivals such as Wacken Open Air and Download Festival. Their energetic live performances and dedication to their fans have contributed to their long-lasting popularity.
Dark Tranquility has released twelve studio albums to date, each with its own unique sound and musical expression. Of particular note here is "The Gallery" (1995), considered by many fans to be a high point of the band's career with its mix of aggression and melody, and "Damage Done" (2002), a return to the band's earlier sound with a focus on fast riffs and intensity.
The band announces that a new album "Endtime Signals" is on the way, and they promise to continue challenging the boundaries of melodic death metal.
Experience Dark Tranquility in November at Pumpehuset together with Moonspeel, Wolftheart and Hiraes.

posts.title: Pind
posts.body:
PIND is back with new music and a concert in Pumpehuset
With the energetic single 'Ups', which helps to emphasize what he has up his sleeve for the coming time, PIND has already started his musical year in 2024. The last year has been spent in the studio, fully focused , and the resulting new music is ready to see the light of day. It is in many ways a completely new PIND, but at the same time exactly as we know him, as a hard-nosed lyricist with an undeniable musical talent. PIND takes the new music and the known talent with him when he visits 11 Danish venues with his band in autumn 2024.
PIND already has its merits, such as the introduction to its unique universe the EP Videre (2019), which i.a. offers the singles Indlæg and Plastic ft. Benjamin Hav, as well as his lyrical debut album LOTUS (2022). The common thread through it all, and the inevitable element of PIND as an artist, are the hard-hitting, well-produced beats, combined with his strong lyricism, which hits exactly where it should. And as always, the music is written and produced by PIND himself.

Experience the Swedish rock phenomenon Smash Into Pieces at Pumpehuset on 8 December 2024
Get ready for an enchanting journey with SMASH INTO PIECES, the Swedish band who have captured the heart of the rock scene since the release of their acclaimed album 'Rise And Shine'. Led by the energetic drummer APOC, they have achieved international recognition and an impressive third place in the Swedish Eurovision final after a semi-final win.
Their hit single 'Six Feet Under' achieved platinum status in record time in Sweden, and with their unique ARCADIA universe, SMASH INTO PIECES is ready to take you on an unforgettable musical journey. Here, as usual, they will create an electrifying concert experience and will cement their place as one of the most exciting names in cinematic rock.
SMASH INTO PIECES continues to soar towards new heights. Their dedication and expertise in every aspect of their career guarantees an unforgettable experience for both established and new fans. Don't miss the chance to experience them at Pumpehuset on 8 December 2024.

posts.title: Blues Pills
posts.body:
Roaring Swedish rock awaits until November
Blues Pills are back with their signature blend of explosive live shows and timeless songs that have won countless fans around the world with their modern take on classic rock. After almost ten years of success with the albums ’’Blues Pills’’ (2014) “Lady In Gold” (2016), and “Holy Moly!” (2020) Blues Pills is now ready to present their fourth studio album "Birthday".
The band describes their new album, "Birthday", as a liberating work where they have left all limitations and expectations behind to create music they truly love. They wanted to capture the raw and authentic vibe of their live performances on the record while challenging themselves to create the best they've ever done. Elin Larsson, the band's charismatic lead singer, discovered during the recordings that she was pregnant, which added an extra dimension to the process and strengthened the band's feminist stance: "During the recordings of the album I discovered I was pregnant. It wasn’t planned so I was a bit overwhelmed and it changed a lot but it actually made it easier for me to write for this album. With all the hormones I was way more emotional than usual, and I wanted to continue with my life even though I'm bringing a kid into the world. It should be natural to be both a mother and an artist, and I want my son Loui to be on that journey with me.”
Blues Pills' new album "Birthday" was written and recorded in Sweden's idyllic landscapes and in Recordia Studios. Produced by acclaimed songwriter and studio guru Fredrik Häggstam, there's an irresistible energy and live feel to Blues Pills' new album, which shows a confidence in their ability to create compelling new releases without tinkering with the explosive formula that provided them their start.

posts.title: BEAK>
posts.body:
Portishead legend Geoff Barrow visits Pumpehuset
The style-creating trip-hop band's beatmaker gives a concert with his krautrock-cultivating band Beak> on November 29 in Pumpehuset.
Few musicians can boast of having created such a masterful musical testament as Geoff Barrow has created as a member of Portishead. But the English musician, producer and DJ is not the type to rest on his laurels. On the contrary, his career outside the legendary Bristol group is characterized by an uncompromising artistic quest that has taken him in several genre directions. Portishead's three studio albums "Dummy" (1994), "Portishead" (1997) and "Third" (2008) are, with their melancholic and soul-searching metropolitan blues, untouchable monoliths in modern popular music and largely characterized by Geoff Barrow's geeky and stylish production wizardry.
After the group's third album came out, he formed the group Beak> to get an outlet for other sides of his musical creative urge. It initially resulted in the self-titled 2009 debut, written and recorded in just 12 days, which is a terrific consciousness-expanding listening experience with delicate references to 70s German krautrock. Since then, the group has released three strong, psychedelic fluorescent studio albums - most recently ">>>" from 2018 - as well as the soundtrack for the film "Couple in a Hole" (2016) and most recently something as special as a soundtrack for a graphic novel, "Cosmic Music ” from 2022.
Geoff Barrow also has the hip-hop project Quakers, has remixed Run The Jewels and worked with artists such as Arcade Fire, Neneh Cherry, The Horrors and The Coral. He has also made music for e.g. The Banksy documentary "Exit Through the Gift Shop", the Netflix series "Black Mirror" and the science fiction films "Ex Machina" and "Annihilation".
In 2020, Beak> visited Denmark for the first time, where Undertoner's reviewer awarded the concert 4.5 out of 6 U's and concluded that Beak> was "Satan's good company". Now the group's Danish fans and other kraut aficionados can once again experience Barrow and co. live here at home, when they envelop the Pumpehuset in cosmic tones on 29 November.

posts.title: LYDSYN
posts.body:
Denmark's king of acid rock, Uffe Lorenzen, is back in Pumpehuset with LYDSYN
LYDSYN is ready to bring their high voltage rock show on the road in the fall of 2024. The band is currently working on their next album in the legendary Sweet Silence Studio. This autumn, it will therefore be with a brand new album in their luggage when they visit Pumpehuset once again.
The trio's new album is produced by Flemming Rasmussen (Metallica, Gasolin', Sort Sol etc.) and this time LYDSYN has chosen the hard way. The tracks are even more cash than the debut record. The hard rock has been turned up and the psychedelic tendencies down.
LYDSYN is a tight playing power trio, dedicated to a pure analog sound experience, free of backing tracks, clicks, samples, auto-tune, and "all the other shit," as they put it themselves. The concerts are not well-choreographed shows, but unique rock concerts that can go either way, depending on the mood, place and audience.
As a band that has established itself as an inescapable force on the Danish rock scene, LYDSYN has played in several places large and small - everything from Ølluminati to Copenhell to ThyLejr Festival to Store Vega and Pumpehuset and the group was on vinyl for many weeks -10 when they released their debut album in 2022.
The power trio consists of Uffe Lorenzen (Baby Woodrose, Spits Nøgenhat) on guitar and vocals, Palle Demant (Hjortene/The Sledge) on bass, and Jens Eyde on drums.

posts.title: Pind
posts.body:
PIND is back with new music and a concert in Pumpehuset
With the energetic single 'Ups', which helps to emphasize what he has up his sleeve for the coming time, PIND has already started his musical year in 2024. The last year has been spent in the studio, fully focused , and the resulting new music is ready to see the light of day. It is in many ways a completely new PIND, but at the same time exactly as we know him, as a hard-nosed lyricist with an undeniable musical talent. PIND takes the new music and the known talent with him when he visits 11 Danish venues with his band in autumn 2024.
PIND already has its merits, such as the introduction to its unique universe the EP Videre (2019), which i.a. offers the singles Indlæg and Plastic ft. Benjamin Hav, as well as his lyrical debut album LOTUS (2022). The common thread through it all, and the inevitable element of PIND as an artist, are the hard-hitting, well-produced beats, combined with his strong lyricism, which hits exactly where it should. And as always, the music is written and produced by PIND himself.

posts.title: Wheel
posts.body:
Wheel serves Finnish prog from the top shelf in mid-December
Wheel is a Finnish prog-metal band from Helsinki, consisting of James Lascelles (vocals/guitar), Santeri Saksala (drums) and Jussi Turunen (lead guitar).
Since they started in 2015, Wheel has quickly grown from underdogs in Helsinki to an internationally recognized band. The trio's 2019 debut album, ''Moving Backwards,'' was immediately embraced by fans of mega-acts like Tool and Coheed & Cambria, as the album features elements like angular riffs, unforgettable melodies, and adventurous scope. The 2021 sequel, Resident Human, also received praise from critics worldwide for its sonic evolution and dystopian themes.
Wheel will go on a European tour in 2024 and in this connection they will visit Pumpehuset on December 11, 2024.

posts.title: Dark Tranquillity
posts.body:
The Swedish melodic death metal band, Dark Tranquility, bring down the Pump House with a strong support line-up November 24, 2024
Dark Tranquility is a Swedish melodic death metal band formed in Gothenburg in 1989. They are considered pioneers of the melodic death metal genre and have had a significant influence on many other bands in the metal world.
The band was formed by guitarists Niklas Sundin and Mikael Stanne, as well as bassist Martin Henriksson. Over the years, the band has gone through several member changes, but Stanne has remained the most prominent member.
Dark Tranquility is known for their complex guitar arrangements, atmospheric keyboard tracks and Stanne's signature growls. Their lyrics often touch on existential and philosophical themes, which has earned them a loyal fan base all over the world.
Over the years, Dark Tranquility has toured extensively around the world and performed at major festivals such as Wacken Open Air and Download Festival. Their energetic live performances and dedication to their fans have contributed to their long-lasting popularity.
Dark Tranquility has released twelve studio albums to date, each with its own unique sound and musical expression. Of particular note here is "The Gallery" (1995), considered by many fans to be a high point of the band's career with its mix of aggression and melody, and "Damage Done" (2002), a return to the band's earlier sound with a focus on fast riffs and intensity.
The band announces that a new album "Endtime Signals" is on the way, and they promise to continue challenging the boundaries of melodic death metal.
Experience Dark Tranquility in November at Pumpehuset together with Moonspeel, Wolftheart and Hiraes.

Get ready for an enchanting journey with SMASH INTO PIECES, the Swedish band who have captured the heart of the rock scene since the release of their acclaimed album 'Rise And Shine'. posts.title: Therapy?
posts.body:
The Northern Irish rock trio celebrates 30 years
Therapy? is a Northern Irish rock band from Larne, formed in 1989 by guitarist and vocalist Andy Cairns. In addition to Cairns, the band consists of Michael McKeegan on bass and vocals and Neil Cooper on drums. The band is famous for their unique fusion of punk, alternative and hard rock, often characterized by intense guitars, sharp lyrics and energetic performances.
The band debuted with the album "Babyteeth" in 1991, marking the beginning of a long and successful career. However, they first gained international recognition with the release of the album "Troublegum" in 1994, for which they are celebrating their 30th anniversary this year. "Troublegum" contains hits like "Screamager" and "Nowhere".
Over the years, the band has released several albums, including "Infernal Love" (1995), "High Anxiety" (2003) and "Hard Cold Fire" (2023), spanning a wide spectrum of genres, from alternative rock and punk to industrial and acoustic music. Their lyrics are often deeply personal and touch on topics such as mental health, relationships and social problems.
Experience Therapy? live in Pumpehuset when they hit Copenhagen on 27 November 2024.

posts.title: Kanonenfieber
posts.body:
Kanonenfieber annoncerer EU Headline Tour 2024 og i denne forbindelse kommer de forbi København i Pumpehuset 4. december
Kanonenfieber er et tysk black metal-band fra Bamberg grundlagt i 2020. Bandets leder og dets eneste medlem er en musiker med kunstnernavnet ’’Noise". Til live-koncerter bliver han ledsaget af gæstemusikere, hvor han kun fokuserer på at synge. I studiet indspiller han dog alle instrumenterne selv.
Udgangspunktet for Kanonenfieber var en udveksling mellem Noise og hans historiker-ven om at skrive et album om Første Verdenskrig baseret på breve og originale dokumenter fra perioden. Noise blev især motiveret til at danne bandet efter at have læst sin afdøde oldefars dagbog, som han skrev ved frontlinjen under Første Verdenskrig.
Musikken er præget af en mørk, aggressiv lyd, som er typisk for genren, mens den inkorporerer melodiske elementer og episke kompositioner, der giver dybde til lydbilledet.
Kanonenfieber udgav første album, “Menschenmühle”, i 2021. Siden da har bandet spillet flere meget succesfulde turnéer, og deres omfattende, dramatiske live-shows har rystet publikum og efterladt dem målløse på anerkendte festivaler som Summer Breeze, Party.San eller Dong Open Air.
Noise og hans liveband, holdes bevidst anonyme, hvilket fungerer som en reference til "Den ukendte soldats grav". Dette er monumenter i forskellige lande verden over, der mindes soldater dræbt i krige.
Gå ikke glip af et dramatisk liveshow og oplev Kanonenfieber 4. december 2024 i Pumpehuset.

With the energetic single 'Ups', which helps to emphasize what he has up his sleeve for the coming time, PIND has already started his musical year in 2024. The last year has been spent in the studio, fully focused , and the resulting new music is ready to see the light of day. It is in many ways a completely new PIND, but at the same time exactly as we know him, as a hard-nosed lyricist with an undeniable musical talent. PIND takes the new music and the known talent with him when he visits 11 Danish venues with his band in autumn 2024.
PIND already has its merits, such as the introduction to its unique universe the EP Videre (2019), which i.a. offers the singles Indlæg and Plastic ft. Benjamin Hav, as well as his lyrical debut album LOTUS (2022). The common thread through it all, and the inevitable element of PIND as an artist, are the hard-hitting, well-produced beats, combined with his strong lyricism, which hits exactly where it should. And as always, the music is written and produced by PIND himself.

posts.title: Dark Tranquillity
posts.body:
The Swedish melodic death metal band, Dark Tranquility, bring down the Pump House with a strong support line-up November 24, 2024
Dark Tranquility is a Swedish melodic death metal band formed in Gothenburg in 1989. They are considered pioneers of the melodic death metal genre and have had a significant influence on many other bands in the metal world.
The band was formed by guitarists Niklas Sundin and Mikael Stanne, as well as bassist Martin Henriksson. Over the years, the band has gone through several member changes, but Stanne has remained the most prominent member.
Dark Tranquility is known for their complex guitar arrangements, atmospheric keyboard tracks and Stanne's signature growls. Their lyrics often touch on existential and philosophical themes, which has earned them a loyal fan base all over the world.
Over the years, Dark Tranquility has toured extensively around the world and performed at major festivals such as Wacken Open Air and Download Festival. Their energetic live performances and dedication to their fans have contributed to their long-lasting popularity.
Dark Tranquility has released twelve studio albums to date, each with its own unique sound and musical expression. Of particular note here is "The Gallery" (1995), considered by many fans to be a high point of the band's career with its mix of aggression and melody, and "Damage Done" (2002), a return to the band's earlier sound with a focus on fast riffs and intensity.
The band announces that a new album "Endtime Signals" is on the way, and they promise to continue challenging the boundaries of melodic death metal.
Experience Dark Tranquility in November at Pumpehuset together with Moonspeel, Wolftheart and Hiraes.

posts.title: Smash Into Pieces
posts.body:
Experience the Swedish rock phenomenon Smash Into Pieces at Pumpehuset on 8 December 2024
Get ready for an enchanting journey with SMASH INTO PIECES, the Swedish band who have captured the heart of the rock scene since the release of their acclaimed album 'Rise And Shine'. Led by the energetic drummer APOC, they have achieved international recognition and an impressive third place in the Swedish Eurovision final after a semi-final win.
Their hit single 'Six Feet Under' achieved platinum status in record time in Sweden, and with their unique ARCADIA universe, SMASH INTO PIECES is ready to take you on an unforgettable musical journey. Here, as usual, they will create an electrifying concert experience and will cement their place as one of the most exciting names in cinematic rock.
SMASH INTO PIECES continues to soar towards new heights. Their dedication and expertise in every aspect of their career guarantees an unforgettable experience for both established and new fans. Don't miss the chance to experience them at Pumpehuset on 8 December 2024.

posts.title: BEAK>
posts.body:
Portishead legend Geoff Barrow visits Pumpehuset
The style-creating trip-hop band's beatmaker gives a concert with his krautrock-cultivating band Beak> on November 29 in Pumpehuset.
Few musicians can boast of having created such a masterful musical testament as Geoff Barrow has created as a member of Portishead. But the English musician, producer and DJ is not the type to rest on his laurels. On the contrary, his career outside the legendary Bristol group is characterized by an uncompromising artistic quest that has taken him in several genre directions. Portishead's three studio albums "Dummy" (1994), "Portishead" (1997) and "Third" (2008) are, with their melancholic and soul-searching metropolitan blues, untouchable monoliths in modern popular music and largely characterized by Geoff Barrow's geeky and stylish production wizardry.
After the group's third album came out, he formed the group Beak> to get an outlet for other sides of his musical creative urge. It initially resulted in the self-titled 2009 debut, written and recorded in just 12 days, which is a terrific consciousness-expanding listening experience with delicate references to 70s German krautrock. Since then, the group has released three strong, psychedelic fluorescent studio albums - most recently ">>>" from 2018 - as well as the soundtrack for the film "Couple in a Hole" (2016) and most recently something as special as a soundtrack for a graphic novel, "Cosmic Music ” from 2022.
Geoff Barrow also has the hip-hop project Quakers, has remixed Run The Jewels and worked with artists such as Arcade Fire, Neneh Cherry, The Horrors and The Coral. He has also made music for e.g. The Banksy documentary "Exit Through the Gift Shop", the Netflix series "Black Mirror" and the science fiction films "Ex Machina" and "Annihilation".
In 2020, Beak> visited Denmark for the first time, where Undertoner's reviewer awarded the concert 4.5 out of 6 U's and concluded that Beak> was "Satan's good company". Now the group's Danish fans and other kraut aficionados can once again experience Barrow and co. live here at home, when they envelop the Pumpehuset in cosmic tones on 29 November.

posts.title: Kanonenfieber
posts.body:
Kanonenfieber annoncerer EU Headline Tour 2024 og i denne forbindelse kommer de forbi København i Pumpehuset 4. december
Kanonenfieber er et tysk black metal-band fra Bamberg grundlagt i 2020. Bandets leder og dets eneste medlem er en musiker med kunstnernavnet ’’Noise". Til live-koncerter bliver han ledsaget af gæstemusikere, hvor han kun fokuserer på at synge. I studiet indspiller han dog alle instrumenterne selv.
Udgangspunktet for Kanonenfieber var en udveksling mellem Noise og hans historiker-ven om at skrive et album om Første Verdenskrig baseret på breve og originale dokumenter fra perioden. Noise blev især motiveret til at danne bandet efter at have læst sin afdøde oldefars dagbog, som han skrev ved frontlinjen under Første Verdenskrig.
Musikken er præget af en mørk, aggressiv lyd, som er typisk for genren, mens den inkorporerer melodiske elementer og episke kompositioner, der giver dybde til lydbilledet.
Kanonenfieber udgav første album, “Menschenmühle”, i 2021. Siden da har bandet spillet flere meget succesfulde turnéer, og deres omfattende, dramatiske live-shows har rystet publikum og efterladt dem målløse på anerkendte festivaler som Summer Breeze, Party.San eller Dong Open Air.
Noise og hans liveband, holdes bevidst anonyme, hvilket fungerer som en reference til "Den ukendte soldats grav". Dette er monumenter i forskellige lande verden over, der mindes soldater dræbt i krige.
Gå ikke glip af et dramatisk liveshow og oplev Kanonenfieber 4. december 2024 i Pumpehuset.

posts.title: Therapy?
posts.body:
The Northern Irish rock trio celebrates 30 years
Therapy? is a Northern Irish rock band from Larne, formed in 1989 by guitarist and vocalist Andy Cairns. In addition to Cairns, the band consists of Michael McKeegan on bass and vocals and Neil Cooper on drums. The band is famous for their unique fusion of punk, alternative and hard rock, often characterized by intense guitars, sharp lyrics and energetic performances.
The band debuted with the album "Babyteeth" in 1991, marking the beginning of a long and successful career. However, they first gained international recognition with the release of the album "Troublegum" in 1994, for which they are celebrating their 30th anniversary this year. "Troublegum" contains hits like "Screamager" and "Nowhere".
Over the years, the band has released several albums, including "Infernal Love" (1995), "High Anxiety" (2003) and "Hard Cold Fire" (2023), spanning a wide spectrum of genres, from alternative rock and punk to industrial and acoustic music. Their lyrics are often deeply personal and touch on topics such as mental health, relationships and social problems.
Experience Therapy? live in Pumpehuset when they hit Copenhagen on 27 November 2024.

posts.title: LYDSYN
posts.body:
Denmark's king of acid rock, Uffe Lorenzen, is back in Pumpehuset with LYDSYN
LYDSYN is ready to bring their high voltage rock show on the road in the fall of 2024. The band is currently working on their next album in the legendary Sweet Silence Studio. This autumn, it will therefore be with a brand new album in their luggage when they visit Pumpehuset once again.
The trio's new album is produced by Flemming Rasmussen (Metallica, Gasolin', Sort Sol etc.) and this time LYDSYN has chosen the hard way. The tracks are even more cash than the debut record. The hard rock has been turned up and the psychedelic tendencies down.
LYDSYN is a tight playing power trio, dedicated to a pure analog sound experience, free of backing tracks, clicks, samples, auto-tune, and "all the other shit," as they put it themselves. The concerts are not well-choreographed shows, but unique rock concerts that can go either way, depending on the mood, place and audience.
As a band that has established itself as an inescapable force on the Danish rock scene, LYDSYN has played in several places large and small - everything from Ølluminati to Copenhell to ThyLejr Festival to Store Vega and Pumpehuset and the group was on vinyl for many weeks -10 when they released their debut album in 2022.
The power trio consists of Uffe Lorenzen (Baby Woodrose, Spits Nøgenhat) on guitar and vocals, Palle Demant (Hjortene/The Sledge) on bass, and Jens Eyde on drums.

posts.title: Wheel
posts.body:
Wheel serves Finnish prog from the top shelf in mid-December
Wheel is a Finnish prog-metal band from Helsinki, consisting of James Lascelles (vocals/guitar), Santeri Saksala (drums) and Jussi Turunen (lead guitar).
Since they started in 2015, Wheel has quickly grown from underdogs in Helsinki to an internationally recognized band. The trio's 2019 debut album, ''Moving Backwards,'' was immediately embraced by fans of mega-acts like Tool and Coheed & Cambria, as the album features elements like angular riffs, unforgettable melodies, and adventurous scope. The 2021 sequel, Resident Human, also received praise from critics worldwide for its sonic evolution and dystopian themes.
Wheel will go on a European tour in 2024 and in this connection they will visit Pumpehuset on December 11, 2024.

posts.title: Blues Pills
posts.body:
Roaring Swedish rock awaits until November
Blues Pills are back with their signature blend of explosive live shows and timeless songs that have won countless fans around the world with their modern take on classic rock. After almost ten years of success with the albums ’’Blues Pills’’ (2014) “Lady In Gold” (2016), and “Holy Moly!” (2020) Blues Pills is now ready to present their fourth studio album "Birthday".
The band describes their new album, "Birthday", as a liberating work where they have left all limitations and expectations behind to create music they truly love. They wanted to capture the raw and authentic vibe of their live performances on the record while challenging themselves to create the best they've ever done. Elin Larsson, the band's charismatic lead singer, discovered during the recordings that she was pregnant, which added an extra dimension to the process and strengthened the band's feminist stance: "During the recordings of the album I discovered I was pregnant. It wasn’t planned so I was a bit overwhelmed and it changed a lot but it actually made it easier for me to write for this album. With all the hormones I was way more emotional than usual, and I wanted to continue with my life even though I'm bringing a kid into the world. It should be natural to be both a mother and an artist, and I want my son Loui to be on that journey with me.”
Blues Pills' new album "Birthday" was written and recorded in Sweden's idyllic landscapes and in Recordia Studios. Produced by acclaimed songwriter and studio guru Fredrik Häggstam, there's an irresistible energy and live feel to Blues Pills' new album, which shows a confidence in their ability to create compelling new releases without tinkering with the explosive formula that provided them their start.
